data.enText: to pay back the money that you have borrowed from sb

data.chText: 偿还债务 / 贷款 / 按揭贷款
你什么时候把钱还给他们？
data.enText: When are you going to repay them?

data.chText: 我将在下个星期偿还欠他们的钱。
data.enText: I'll repay the money I owe them next week.

data.chText: 我非常想把他们借给我的钱还给他们。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+名词短语

data.enText: I fully intend to repay them the money that they lent me.
to give sth to sb or do sth for them in return for sth that they have done for you

data.chText: 你对我这样慷慨，我怎么才能报答你呢？
data.enText: How can I ever repay you for your generosity?

data.chText: 他们的信任获得的回报是忠心耿耿。
data.enText: Their trust was repaid with fierce loyalty.
if sth repays your attention, interest, study, etc., it is worth spending time to look at it, etc.

data.chText: 这份报告值得仔细阅读。

tr: make repayment for or return something
act or give recompense in recognition of someone's behavior or actions

value.def: If you repay a loan or a debt, you pay back the money that you owe to the person who you borrowed or took it from.

example.ex: It will take 30 years to repay the loan...
example.tran: 还清贷款需要30年的时间。

example.ex: He advanced funds of his own to his company, which was unable to repay him.
example.tran: 他把自己的资金预付给他的公司，而公司却不能把钱偿还给他。

value.def: If you repay a favour that someone did for you, you do something for them in return.

example.ex: It was very kind. I don't know how I can ever repay you...
example.tran: 真是太好了。我都不知道怎么报答你才好。

example.ex: I owe them a debt that cannot easily be repaid.
example.tran: 我欠他们一笔钱，不容易偿还。
